title: The Cigar Authority 12th Anniversary LIVE
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority 12th Anniversary LIVE
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… 12 Years Ago (in 2010) – Dave had a crazy idea to start a podcast and he wasn’t even sure what a podcast was. Today – our studio audience flew from around the world, to join us as we celebrate 12 years of the show! It’s the figgin’ Catalina Wine Mixer on steroids… The Cigar Authority’s 12 Year Anniversary!

In the first hour we light up a cigar that made specifically for this special event. It was labeled a Surprise Cigar in the care package and today we tell you what that cigar is as we light em up, light em up, light em up! In the second hour we light up another cigar with our studio audience in the Fleur de la Reine Cinq Maduro.

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Cigar News, The email of the week and a peek into the Asylum.

As always you can find many of the cigars we smoke at https://www.2guyscigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
